title: Looking for a good ADC :D
body:
umm... I'm a Support main. i play mainly {{champion:412}} ,  {{champion:16}} , {{champion:223}}    and {{champion:497}} .
I am currently in Bronze III right now. but in my home country's server, I'm in Plat IV.
i really like friendly adc :D 

~Thanks :D

replies.body: S4 adc main! add me to duo!
